name: System Failure - Remastered
description:

get the new alpha for my game in work

New Patch Update 13/02/22

- new Pause Button on top right left, do not worry. the old "escape" button to pause will still be there :D

- The graphics button has been upgraded, 

last time if you join a game on low graphics, and then leave the game you'll go right back to high graphics

NOW: when you join on Low graphics and then leave, you'll stay on the same graphics you set the game to :D

Big Update Next:

- Working AI (Models)

- More Mechanics

- More Cameras

- More Characters

- More Added Stuff Coming Soon

- More graphics options coming soon....
